normalised: Hey Social Media Gurus! Ever wondered if your Insta reels are really resonating with your audience like that perfect plate of Momos on a rainy day in Delhi? Well, dig this: follower analytics are getting a major upgrade. Doctor Sharma from I I M Ahmedabad, in a recent study, highlighted the need for more granular insights. Apparently, vanity metrics like follower count are so last season. We're talking deeper dives: engagement by demographics, peak activity times (perfect for scheduling those seven p m Chai-time posts!), and even sentiment analysis around your content. Several Indian influencer marketing agencies are now offering advanced analytics packages. Think beyond basic likes and comments – imagine tracking which posts led to actual conversions, like that special rupee nine hundred and ninety nine discount on a handcrafted saree from Jaipur! Or figuring out if your audience is more likely to engage with content featuring a traditional Diwali scene versus a modern cafe setting. This data is crucial for maximizing R O I, especially if you're eyeing that prime real estate space of five hundred square feet for your new influencer marketing H Q near Bandra. Time to get serious about those numbers!

Dr. Sharma from IIM-Ahmedabad, in a recent study, highlighted the need for more granular insights. Apparently, vanity metrics like follower count are so last season. We're talking deeper dives: engagement by demographics, peak activity times (perfect for scheduling those 7 pm Chai-time posts!), and even sentiment analysis around your content.

Several Indian influencer marketing agencies are now offering advanced analytics packages.
